idea-plugin.name: Dev Tools
idea-plugin.description:
A comprehensive developer toolbox plugin for IntelliJ IDEA, providing essential utilities for daily development tasks.

Features:
  • JSON Formatter - Beautify, compress, validate JSON with syntax highlighting and error detection
  • Byte Decoder - Convert between hexadecimal, binary, and decimal with bit-level visualization
  • Byte Parser - Parse byte data by offset and length, supporting multiple data types (Int8/16/32/64, Float, Double, String) with endianness support

开发者工具箱插件，包含：JSON 格式化工具（美化、压缩、语法校验）、字节解码器（进制转换、位可视化）、字节解析器（自定义规则解析）
